name: reading-diploma-web-game-backend
description: Capstone Project 1. The gamified reading diploma web game for youth.

comments.type: not sure if the type should be 'module' or 'commonjs'

devDependencies.devDependencies: packages used only in testing and development
devDependencies.eslint: ESLint is used to maintain code quality and consistency (automatic testing of code style)
devDependencies.nodemon: Nodemon is used for hot reloading the running server when new changes are saved
devDependencies.globals: Globals is used to define global variables for ESLint
devDependencies.cors: CORS is used to enable cross-origin resource sharing, allowing the backend to handle requests from different origins
devDependencies.express-async-errors: Async/await error handling support for express.js
devDependencies.zod: Used in error handling (input validation). More documentation (https://zod.dev/)
devDependencies.passport-local: Plugins that the passport uses as strategies (https://github.com/jaredhanson/passport-local)
